verses.verse: כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִמְשִׁיחוֹ֮ <S%H4899><s%> to his anointed לְכ֣וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> to Cyrus אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whom הֶחֱזַ֣קְתִּי <S%H2388><s%> I have holden בִֽימִינ֗וֹ <S%H3225><s%> whose right hand לְרַד־ <S%H7286><s%> to subdue לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> nations וּמָתְנֵ֥י <S%H4975><s%> the loins מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> of kings אֲפַתֵּ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> him and I will loose לִפְתֹּ֤חַ <S%H6605><s%> to open לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before דְּלָתַ֔יִם <S%H1817><s%> him the two leaved gates וּשְׁעָרִ֖ים <S%H8179><s%> and the gates לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִסָּגֵֽרוּ׃ <S%H5462><s%> shall not be shut

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before אֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go וַהֲדוּרִ֖ים <S%H1921><s%> the crooked places [אֹושִׁר כ] (אֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <S%H3474><s%> direct ק) דַּלְת֤וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the gates נְחוּשָׁה֙ <S%H5154><s%> of brass אֲשַׁבֵּ֔ר <S%H7665><s%> I will break in pieces וּבְרִיחֵ֥י <S%H1280><s%> the bars בַרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron אֲגַדֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H1438><s%> and cut in sunder

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give לְךָ֙ אוֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> thee the treasures חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness וּמַטְמֻנֵ֖י <S%H4301><s%> and hidden riches מִסְתָּרִ֑ים <S%H4565><s%> of secret places לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תֵּדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> that thou mayest know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> is I יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD הַקּוֹרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> which call בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> [thee] by thy name אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> [am] the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> the sake עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant's יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> For Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> sake and Israel בְּחִירִ֑י <S%H972><s%> mine elect וָאֶקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> I have even called לְךָ֙ בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thee by thy name אֲכַנְּךָ֖ <S%H3655><s%> I have surnamed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> thee though thou hast not known

אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> other זוּלָתִ֖י <S%H2108><s%> beside אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> and [there is] none else [there is] no God אֲאַזֶּרְךָ֖ <S%H247><s%> me I girded וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> thee though thou hast not known

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> That they may know מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> from the rising שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun וּמִמַּ֣עֲרָבָ֔הּ <S%H4628><s%> and from the west כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> there אֶ֖פֶס <S%H657><s%> that [there is] none בִּלְעָדָ֑י <S%H1107><s%> beside אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> me I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> other

יוֹצֵ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> I form אוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> the light וּבוֹרֵ֣א <S%H1254><s%> and create חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> darkness עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> I make שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וּב֣וֹרֵא <S%H1254><s%> and create רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> do כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these ס

הַרְעִ֤יפוּ <S%H7491><s%> Drop down שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> ye heavens מִמַּ֔עַל <S%H4605><s%> from above וּשְׁחָקִ֖ים <S%H7834><s%> and let the skies יִזְּלוּ־ <S%H5140><s%> pour down צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness תִּפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> open אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> let the earth וְיִפְרוּ־ <S%H6509><s%> and let them bring forth יֶ֗שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> salvation וּצְדָקָ֤ה <S%H6666><s%> and let righteousness תַצְמִ֙יחַ֙ <S%H6779><s%> spring up יַ֔חַד <S%H3162><s%> together אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD בְּרָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H1254><s%> have created ס

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe רָ֚ב <S%H7378><s%> unto him that striveth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹ֣צְר֔וֹ <S%H3335><s%> with his Maker חֶ֖רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> [Let] the potsherd אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַרְשֵׂ֣י <S%H2789><s%> [strive] with the potsherds אֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth הֲיֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> say חֹ֤מֶר <S%H2563><s%> Shall the clay לְיֹֽצְרוֹ֙ <S%H3335><s%> to him that fashioneth מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> it What makest וּפָעָלְךָ֖ <S%H6467><s%> thou? or thy work אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> has יָדַ֥יִם <S%H3027><s%> able לֽוֹ׃ ס

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe אֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> unto him that saith לְאָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> unto [his] father מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תּוֹלִ֑יד <S%H3205><s%> What begettest וּלְאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> thou? or to the woman מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to what תְּחִילִֽין׃ <S%H2342><s%> What hast thou brought forth ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיֹצְר֑וֹ <S%H3335><s%> and his Maker הָאֹתִיּ֣וֹת <S%H857><s%> me of things to come שְׁאָל֔וּנִי <S%H7592><s%> Ask עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about בָּנַ֛י <S%H1121><s%> concerning my sons וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning פֹּ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> and concerning the work יָדַ֖י <S%H3027><s%> of my hands תְּצַוֻּֽנִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> command

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> is I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have made אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> man עָלֶ֣יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and בָרָ֑אתִי <S%H1254><s%> and created אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> my יָדַי֙ <S%H3027><s%> upon it I [even] my hands נָט֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> have stretched out שָׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָאָ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> and all their host צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> have I commanded

אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I הַעִירֹתִ֣הֽוּ <S%H5782><s%> I have raised him up בְצֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> in righteousness וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> all his ways אֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <S%H3474><s%> and I will direct הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He יִבְנֶ֤ה <S%H1129><s%> he shall build עִירִי֙ <S%H5892><s%> my city וְגָלוּתִ֣י <S%H1546><s%> my captives יְשַׁלֵּ֔חַ <S%H7971><s%> and he shall let go לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Without בִמְחִיר֙ <S%H4242><s%> not for price וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Without בְשֹׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> nor reward אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts פ

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God יְגִ֨יעַ <S%H3018><s%> The labour מִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּֽסְחַר־ <S%H5505><s%> and merchandise כּוּשׁ֮ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia וּסְבָאִים֮ <S%H5436><s%> and of the Sabeans אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> men מִדָּה֒ <S%H4060><s%> of stature עָלַ֤יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and יַעֲבֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> shall come over וְלָ֣ךְ יִֽהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרַ֣יִךְ <S%H310><s%> after יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בַּזִּקִּ֖ים <S%H2131><s%> thee in chains יַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <S%H5674><s%> they shall come over וְאֵלַ֤יִךְ <S%H413><s%> and יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> and they shall fall down אֵלַ֣יִךְ <S%H413><s%> to you יִתְפַּלָּ֔לוּ <S%H6419><s%> unto thee they shall make supplication אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely בָּ֥ךְ אֵ֛ל <S%H410><s%> unto thee [saying] Surely God וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> else אֶ֥פֶס <S%H657><s%> [is] in thee and [there is] none else [there is] no אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

אָכֵ֕ן <S%H403><s%> Verily אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> thou [art] a God מִסְתַּתֵּ֑ר <S%H5641><s%> that hidest אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> thyself O God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> the Saviour

בּ֥וֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> They shall be ashamed וְגַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> and even נִכְלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> and also confounded כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> all יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> all of them they shall go בַכְּלִמָּ֔ה <S%H3639><s%> to confusion חָרָשֵׁ֖י <S%H2796><s%> [that are] makers צִירִֽים׃ <S%H6736><s%> of idols

יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> [But] Israel נוֹשַׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> shall be saved בַּיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD תְּשׁוּעַ֖ת <S%H8668><s%> salvation עוֹלָמִ֑ים <S%H5769><s%> with an everlasting לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye shall not be ashamed וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or תִכָּלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> nor confounded עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against ע֥וֹלְמֵי <S%H5769><s%> world עַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> without end פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בּוֹרֵ֨א <S%H1254><s%> that created הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God יֹצֵ֨ר <S%H3335><s%> himself that formed הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְעֹשָׂהּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> and made ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He כֽוֹנְנָ֔הּ <S%H3559><s%> it he hath established לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֹ֥הוּ <S%H8414><s%> it not in vain בְרָאָ֖הּ <S%H1254><s%> it he created לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> it to be inhabited יְצָרָ֑הּ <S%H3335><s%> he formed אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> else

לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> not בַסֵּ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in secret דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> I have not spoken בִּמְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> place אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in a dark לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not אָמַ֛רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said לְזֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> not unto the seed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob תֹּ֣הוּ <S%H8414><s%> ye me in vain בַקְּשׁ֑וּנִי <S%H1245><s%> Seek אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD דֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> speak צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness מַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> I declare מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> things that are right
